languages.text: {n}Выпучив глаза, Космический волк пожирает глазами инквизитора и молчит. Его лицо багровеет. Похоже, не только вы были не посвящены в замысел Калькасара. Наконец он глухо выдыхает:{/n} "Юкко вонючий!"

{n}Ulfar stares at the Inquisitor with wide eyes, saying nothing. It seems you were not the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy,{/n} "Morkai howls for you, Inquisitor."
languages.original_text: {n}Выпучив глаза, Космический волк пожирает глазами инквизитора и молчит. Его лицо багровеет. Похоже, не только вы были не посвящены в замысел Калькасара. Наконец он глухо выдыхает:{/n} "Юкко вонючий!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Space Wolf ogles the Inquisitor with his bulging eyes, silent. His face turns red. It seems you weren't the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy:{/n} "You stinking jukko!"

{n}The Space Wolf ogles the Inquisitor with his bulging eyes, silent. His face turns red. It seems you weren't the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy:{/n} "You stinking jukko!"

{n}The Space Wolf ogles the Inquisitor with his bulging eyes, silent. His face turns red. It seems you weren't the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy:{/n} "You stinking jukko!"

{n}The Space Wolf ogles the Inquisitor with his bulging eyes, silent. His face turns red. It seems you weren't the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy:{/n} "You stinking jukko!"

{n}Ulfar stares at the Inquisitor with wide eyes, saying nothing. His face turns red. It seems you were not the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy,{/n} "You fetid jukko!"

{n}Ulfar stares at the Inquisitor with wide eyes, saying nothing. It seems you were not the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy,{/n} "Morkai howls for you, Inquisitor."

languages.text: {n}Les yeux écarquillés, Ulfar fixe l'inquisiteur en silence. Manifestement, vous n'étiez pas {mf|le seul|la seule} à ignorer le plan de Calcazar. Il finit par pousser un soupir et dit d'une voix lourde :{/n} « Que Morkaï vous emporte, inquisiteur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares at the Inquisitor with wide eyes, saying nothing. It seems you were not the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy,{/n} "Morkai howls for you, Inquisitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux écarquillés, Ulfar fixe l'inquisiteur en silence. Son visage s'empourpre. Manifestement, vous n'étiez pas {mf|le seul|la seule} à ignorer le plan de Calcazar. Il finit par pousser un soupir et dit d'une voix lourde :{/n} « Espèce de sale jukko ! »

languages.text: {n}Ulfar observa al Inquisidor con los ojos abiertos de par en par sin decir palabra. Parece que Calcazar no compartió sus planes con mucha gente. Finalmente, declara con voz pesada:{/n} «Morkai aúlla por tu sangre, Inquisidor».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares at the Inquisitor with wide eyes, saying nothing. It seems you were not the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy,{/n} "Morkai howls for you, Inquisitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lobo Espacial fija su mirada en el Inquisidor sin decir palabra. Su cara se vuelve roja. Parece que él tampoco estaba al corriente del plan de Calcazar. Finalmente, logra escupir con pesadez:{/n} «¡Jukko nauseabundo!».

languages.text: {n}乌尔法睁大了眼睛，死死地瞪着大审判官，一言不发。看来，被卡尔卡扎蒙在鼓里的人，并不只有你自己。到最后，他喘了一大口气，以沉重的声音开了口。{/n}“莫凯会为你怒嚎，审判官。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares at the Inquisitor with wide eyes, saying nothing. It seems you were not the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy,{/n} "Morkai howls for you, Inquisitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法眼睛暴突着，一言不发地凝视着审判长。看来，被卡尔卡扎蒙在鼓里的人，并不只有你自己。到最后，他喘了一大口气，以沉重的声音开了口。{/n}“你这个臭杂种！”

languages.text: {n}Ulfar starrt den Inquisitor mit weit aufgerissenen Augen wortlos an. Offenbar bist du nicht {mf|der Einzige, der|die Einzige, die} nichts von Calcazars Plan wusste. Schließlich atmet er aus und sagt mit schwerer Stimme:{/n} "Morkai heult um Euch, Inquisitor."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares at the Inquisitor with wide eyes, saying nothing. It seems you were not the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy,{/n} "Morkai howls for you, Inquisitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Space Wolf starrt den Inquisitor mit seinen hervorwölbenden Augen stumm an. Sein Gesicht färbt sich rot. Offenbar war Calcazars Plan nicht nur dir gänzlich unbekannt. Schließlich atmet er aus und sagt mit schwerer Stimme:{/n} "Ihr stinkendes Ungeziefer!"

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは無言のまま、見開いた目で異端審問官を見つめる。どうやらカルカサルの計画に気づかなかったのは、あなただけではなかったようだ。彼はついに息を吐き出し、重々しく声を発する。{/n}「モルカイがお前の為に吠えるだろうよ、異端審問官」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares at the Inquisitor with wide eyes, saying nothing. It seems you were not the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy,{/n} "Morkai howls for you, Inquisitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは無言のまま、見開いた目で異端審問官を見つめる。どうやらカルカサルの計画に気づかなかったのは、あなただけではなかったようだ。彼はついに息を吐き出し、重々しく声を発する。{/n}「モルカイがお前の為に吠えるだろうよ、異端審問官」

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, kocaman açtığı gözleriyle Engizisyoncu'ya bakıp hiçbir şey demiyor. Calcazar'ın planından haberdar olmayan bir tek sen değilmişsin gibi duruyor. Derin bir nefes verip ağır bir sesle cevap veriyor.{/n} "Morkai senin için uluyor Engizisyoncu."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares at the Inquisitor with wide eyes, saying nothing. It seems you were not the only one unaware of Calcazar's plan. He finally breathes out, his voice heavy,{/n} "Morkai howls for you, Inquisitor."
